use.flag: Build the data processing tools (i.e. dictionary compilers)

pkgmetadata.longdescription: This is a native Haskell implementation of the zxcvbn password strength estimation algorithm as it appears in the 2016 USENIX Security <https://www.usenix.org/conference/usenixsecurity16/technical-sessions/presentation/wheeler paper> and presentation (with some small modifications).
